name: Extinction of the Gods Demo
description: You got 6 different skills, with E button you can make a shield to decrease the damage taken to 50%, with R button you can spawn up to 3 minions, with Left Mouse Button you can melee attack and if you press Q the melee attack changes into a rolling kick attack, which consumes mana and is in action while you hold down Left Mouse Button. If you hold down Right Mouse Button, you enter aiming mode, and by holding down Left Mouse Button, you can shoot a constant beam consuming mana, if you press Q while in aiming mode, the range skill changes into a ki blast, which shoots on the direction u are facing, this also consumes mana. By holding down Shift button you can sprint. By pressing P you can enter Pause Menu and pause the game.
